00021                 private static function wikize($term)
00022                 {

00032                 private static function lookup_url($term, $lang = 'en')
00033                 {
00034                         return sprintf(self::wikipedia_url_scheme,
00035                                 $lang,

00045                 public static function lookup($term, $lang = 'en')
